医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
自由输血可以降低复发风险，提高贫血心脏病患者的生存率由罗格斯大学罗伯特伍德约翰逊医学院杰出医学教授、医生杰弗里·L·卡森领导的一项国际临床试验发现，为心脏病发作并患有贫血的患者进行自由输血可能会降低心脏病复发的风险，并且可以降低心脏病复发的风险。提高生存率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Liberal-blood-transfusion-may-reduce-recurrence-risk-improve-survival-in-heart-attack-病人-with-anemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Liberal-blood-transfusion-may-reduce-recurrence-risk-improve-survival-in-heart-attack-病人-with-anemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74f0b81b-c2bd-4f5b-98ef-1b62ad30627f Sun, 12 Nov 2023 22:47:00 -0500 Liberal blood transfusion may reduce recurrence risk, improve survival in heart attack patients with anemia
多祖先研究揭示了 187 个新的前列腺癌遗传风险因素在一项全面的多祖先 GWAS 荟萃分析中，研究人员发现了 451 个前列腺癌风险变异，其中包括 187 个新变异，证明了此类研究在不同人群中的实用性。该分析不仅增加了对遗传风险因素的理解，而且区分了侵袭性和非侵袭性前列腺癌类型，强调了遗传风险评分在指导筛查和早期检测策略方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Multi-ancestry-study-reveals-187-new-genic-risk-factors-for-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Multi-ancestry-study-reveals-187-new-genic-risk-factors-for-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0dbfd957-7559-4987-b629-998b9f692102 Sun, 12 Nov 2023 22:28:00 -0500 Multi-ancestry study reveals 187 new genetic risk factors for prostate cancer
UCI 研究人员发现对肌肉修复至关重要的基因加州大学欧文分校的研究人员发现了一种在再生过程中表达的基因，该基因对于肌肉修复至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/UCI-researchers-discover-gene-ritic-for-muscle-repair.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/UCI-researchers-discover-gene-ritic-for-muscle-repair.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f32d3482-c41f-4554-ab29-96bbb496bb6b Sun, 12 Nov 2023 22:27:09 -0500 UCI researchers discover gene critical for muscle repair
开放科学的胜利：众包倡议产生了有效的 SARS-CoV-2 抗病毒药物在这项研究中，研究人员利用众包和开放科学开发针对 SARS-CoV-2 的新型抗病毒药物，重点关注其主要蛋白酶 Mpro。他们的方法发现了有效的化合物，其中包括一种对细胞系高效且针对各种 COVID-19 变体具有交叉反应性的化合物，展示了协作和透明药物发现在应对全球健康危机方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Open-science-triumph-Crowdsourced-initiative-yields-potted-SARS-CoV-2-antivirals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Open-science-triumph-Crowdsourced-initiative-yields-potted-SARS-CoV-2-antivirals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=980e11db-b655-491e-88e6-98bbc31342e5 Sun, 12 Nov 2023 22:12:00 -0500 Open-science triumph: Crowdsourced initiative yields potent SARS-CoV-2 antivirals
研究人员确定了 DNA 修复机制中涉及的关键因素东京都立大学的研究人员已经确定了我们体内 DNA 修复机制的关键因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Researchers-identify-key-factors-involved-in-DNA-repair-mechanism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Researchers-identify-key-factors-involved-in-DNA-repair-mechanism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f914f73-2b38-427b-9213-9e362c8e4e84 Sun, 12 Nov 2023 21:53:43 -0500 Researchers identify key factors involved in DNA repair mechanism
研究表明，母亲的代谢状况与儿童的神经发育风险有关研究调查了孕前糖尿病、妊娠糖尿病和肥胖等母亲代谢状况如何介导儿童神经发育状况的风险。它强调了产科和新生儿并发症在这种关系中的重要作用，强调需要管理这些并发症，以减轻儿童患多动症和自闭症等疾病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Maternal-metabolic-conditions-linked-to-childrens-neurodevelopmental-risks-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Maternal-metabolic-conditions-linked-to-childrens-neurodevelopmental-risks-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c8764b9-5b50-427b-a2ea-5f40001cd145 Sun, 12 Nov 2023 21:38:00 -0500 Maternal metabolic conditions linked to children's neurodevelopmental risks, study shows
研究表明同时使用抗抑郁药和他汀类药物可以防止治疗中断《BMC Medicine》杂志最近的一项研究评估了抗抑郁药与他汀类药物联合治疗对英国成年人的现实影响，结果显示与仅使用抗抑郁药治疗相比，停药率较低，但疗效相似。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Study-suggests-concomitant-antidepressant-and-statin-use-could-prevent-treatment-discontinuation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Study-suggests-concomitant-antidepressant-and-statin-use-could-prevent-treatment-discontinuation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8387af9-37d2-44cb-a8da-2b6239a6d419 Sun, 12 Nov 2023 21:24:00 -0500 Study suggests concomitant antidepressant and statin use could prevent treatment discontinuation
澳大利亚研究表明，对主要遗传性疾病进行联合基因组筛查具有成本效益且可挽救健康在 EClinicalMedicine 上发表的一项澳大利亚研究中，研究人员评估了联合基因组筛查计划对年轻人遗传性乳腺癌和卵巢癌、林奇综合征和家族性高胆固醇血症的影响。事实证明，该计划具有成本效益，可以降低医疗保健成本并避免大量健康事件，同时强调需要进一步优化公共医疗保健系统并实现公平获取。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Australian-study-shows-combined-genomic-screening-for-major-hereditary-diseases-is-cost-efficient-and-health- saving.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Australian-study-shows-combined-genomic-screening-for-major-hereditary-diseases-is-cost-efficient-and-health- saving.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36ef2bdb-ca56-402c-a893-fe8bf002dde2 Sun, 12 Nov 2023 21:05:00 -0500 Australian study shows combined genomic screening for major hereditary diseases is cost-effective and health-saving
基因疗法的双刃剑：突破性疗法面临制造和功效研究探讨了基因治疗对各种疾病的进展、挑战和经济影响，包括遗传性血液疾病、CAR-T 细胞治疗的恶性肿瘤以及体内 AAV 载体靶向的疾病。该评论强调了基因疗法的变革潜力，同时承认制造、安全性、有效性和长期耐久性方面的复杂性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Gene-therapys-double-edged-sword-Breakthrough-treatments-face-manufacturing-and-efficacy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231112/Gene-therapys-double-edged-sword-Breakthrough-treatments-face-manufacturing-and-efficacy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9233687d-8072-4362-a7b8-8dde9718f991 Sun, 12 Nov 2023 20:55:00 -0500 Gene therapy's double-edged sword: Breakthrough treatments face manufacturing and efficacy
DZNE 神经科学家获得资助研究神经退行性疾病与心理健康之间的联系阿尔茨海默氏症和帕金森氏症等神经退行性疾病可能与抑郁和焦虑有关。 Sabine Krabbe 博士是 DZNE 波恩基地的神经科学家，她从 Chan Zuckerberg Initiative 获得了 120 万美元，用于了解这些综合症的发病机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231110/DZNE-neuroscientist-receives-grant-to-study-link- Between-neurodogenic-diseases-and-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231110/DZNE-neuroscientist-receives-grant-to-study-link- Between-neurodogenic-diseases-and-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8dce2ba-e968-4e18-85d0-ccfa1cf88d43 Fri, 10 Nov 2023 21:13:00 -0500 DZNE neuroscientist receives grant to study link between neurodegenerative diseases and mental health
